about.title: About Us
about.text: Nobi-Stal is an expert in the production of springs and screens. Nobi-Stal's customers are companies from all over the world who use our products in the mining, agricultural, construction, energy industries. Our springs are characterized by very good strength properties because they use advanced production technology. Industries such as agriculture, mining, construction, energy require components that will stand up to harsh conditions and ensure long service life of machinery. Our springs are used, among others: tractors, harvesters, plows. On special order we offer springs used in soil loosening machines.

subpage.products.title: All Nobi-Stal products are available upon ordering.
subpage.products.text: NOBI-STAL specializes in the production of technical springs both in large quantities and in single orders.In the case of special springs, Nobi-Stal has the ability to produce to the customer's special order.

subpage.productsInformation.title: NOBI-STAL
subpage.productsInformation.text1: Nobi-stal is one of the largest suppliers of technical springs available from stock. With a wide range of high quality products we deliver springs quickly and at a favorable price. The long tradition and international character of the company makes, that Nobi-Stal solutions meet the requirements of both European standards, UIC, Russian GOST, as well as Chinese TB/T. Innovation, competence technological and design competence, several decades of experience and the desire to to follow the ever-increasing requirements of customers constitute the quality of the products and solutions offered.
subpage.productsInformation.text2: We are constantly expanding our product offerings becoming an even better partner for our customers.
subpage.productsInformation.list1: Fast delivery of Catalogs of springs and standard parts
subpage.productsInformation.list5: Guaranteed quality delivery according DIN / NEN / ISO0

carousel.products.title: Our products
carousel.products.text: We have a lot of experience in production, and we offer the possibility of making springs on special order.

doradztwo.title: Do you need advice?
doradztwo.secondText: Nobi-Stal has huge experience and offers one of the largest capacities in the market for the production of technical springs, preferred, woven, braided and expanded metal screens
